ReadAccess.name: Read access
ReadAccess.help_text: Each bit [23:16] corresponds to Regions [7:0]. If the bit is set, read access is granted.

WriteAccess.name: Write access
WriteAccess.help_text: Each bit [23:16] corresponds to Regions [7:0]. If the bit is set, write access is granted.

VendorId.name: Vendor ID
VendorId.help_text: The vendor specific byte of the JEDEC ID.

DeviceId0.name: Device ID 0
DeviceId0.help_text: The first device specific byte of the JEDEC ID.

DeviceId1.name: Device ID 1
DeviceId1.help_text: The second device specific byte of the JEDEC ID.

MeVsccValue.name: VSCC register value
MeVsccValue.help_text: This entry will only add SPI flash support for IntelÂ® Management Engine FW. Contact your BIOS vendor to ensure Host VSCC will be set for this part.
